transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Yes sir good morning bol raha hu mai IndiaMART account manager.
Haan.
So ek complaint tha mam isme dekhiye first of all aap se to IndiaMART matlab legal team connect karti hai, thik hai? Wo aapko call jayegi aap please unko explain kar dijiyega jo bhi issue hai aapka, okay? Second of all
As an account manager mera jo isme role rehta hai wo education ka hi rehta hai, okay? To matlab mera ye hai ki first of all rukiye mai aapko ek screenshot bhej du.
Ek second.
Mai aapko whatsapp pe ek screenshot bheja hu abhi just.
Ek minute.
To haan.
Mere ko to ye collect karke paste karna rehta hai.
Check kar lijiye aap.
Thik hai, isko abhi side rakhte hai, isme IndiaMART matlab mujhe ye client se wahi kehte hai ki discuss karne ko buyer ke sath, okay? Issue resolve karne ko and matlab ek ye bhi rehta hai mam ki repeated complaints agar aati hai buyer ki to IndiaMART matlab it has the authority to matlab stop the services agar wo issue unresolved rehti hai to, okay? But aap cooperate karte hai, thik hai to koi issue nahi hai usme. Aapko ek legal team connect karegi IndiaMART ke through, please buyer ke sath coordinate karke ek mutual resolution pe aap aa jaiyega so that ye issue yaha pe close ho jaye kyuki yaha ticket raised hai to mera isme yahi role rehta hai aapko batana, alright?
So ye sab
Aapko apne end se kuch batana hai to bataiye matlab recorded line pe baat rehti hai to wo matlab matlab review hota hi hai wo sab yaha pe.
Energy minerals buyer ka naam hai.
Customer: Mujhe ye man lo apni side explain karni hai to kisko karni hai, aapko karni hai ya legal team ko karni hai?
Kyuki agar cheeze repeat bhi karni hai to it's better ki mai direct legal team se baat karu.
Executive: To fir team hi aapko connect karegi kya hai usme usme matlab thik hai to
Customer: Hello?
Haan bolo.
Executive: Hello?
Mere ko to aap bas ye jo maine documents request kiye hai aap wo share kar dijiyega, alright? Matlab wo mujhe paste karna hai mail par, so matlab aap
Customer: Already humne IndiaMART me dale hue hi hai already jab ye services humne start ki thi tab bhi humne sare udyam bhi usme dala tha, photo udyam ka chalo optional hai, office premises ke photo bhi andar dale the, certificate bhi andar dala hua hai, address proof bhi dala hua tha, thik hai cancel hum ek baar dobara share kar dijiye. hua hi tha.
Executive: Mam ek baar aap dobara share kar dijiye kyuki wo ticket pe paste karna hai mujhe jo wo team rehti hai unke paas wo hard nahi rehti cheeze aapke jo documents hai to matlab mujhe aap yaha se proof karke unko share karna padta hai padta hai, okay? To aap matlab
Customer: Ja jis system se aap chal rahe ho mujhe koi option nahi hai to cooperate, thik hai? Ki mujhe koi problem nahi hai wo aapki choice hai mam. agar koi bhi customer mai aapko screenshot bhejti hu customer ke sath jo bhi mujhe nahi chahiye please mujhe nahi, mujhe nahi, mujhe nahi matlab mere ko wo required nahi hai. aap bas please hum team se baat ho jane dijiye. We have our own legal team dekho aisa mat samjho agar IndiaMART kuch hame pareshan karega na to hum bhi ready hai to to fight with whatever it is kyuki customer to kal jaake kuch bhi bol dega.
Executive: Yes, exactly so mam dekhiye matlab mujhe main aapko details main tabhi provide karungi after meri legal team se baat hogi uske baad kyuki dekho personally mere paas bhi itna time nahi hai ki customer kabhi bhi jaake chhoti si complaint kar de aur hum ye sab document mam aise cooperate karne se to nahi hoga na issue resolve mam aise matlab aap ye matlab aapka haan matlab aise to fir issue resolve nahi hoga aap agar uncooperative rahenge to. Maine pehle bhi bola ki mujhe legal team se baat hone ke baad hi ye sare documents to isme na mera bhi ek role hai na mam mera bhi ek role hai jo matlab mujhe sales and unko team ko kya role hai? Kal jaake man lo as a buyer maine bhi bahut complaint ki hai.
Hmm.
As a buyer mere sath bhi IndiaMART se fraud hua hai lekin koi action nahi kisi legal team ka mujhe to call nahi aaya hai. To mam aapne matlab resolve karke de abhi recently aapne mai aap aap se baat bhi hui thi ki wo supplier ne humse bahut rude tarike se baat ki thi aur unhone khamakha extra charge liya tha uska bhi mujhe call nahi aaya hai legal team se. Mam rude ways ka mam mam monetary matlab deficit ka matlab fraud ka wo complaint rehti hai ab rude ke liye to mam hum rating hi provide kar sakte hai. Fraud ka bhi dala tha sir and I speak with that humne fraud ka bhi dala tha lekin hame to kisi ka call nahi aaya to solve mam dekh lenge mam aise matlab ye
Customer: Okay mam dekhiye isme dekho aapko band karna hai ek second ke liye lekin fir meri bhi legal team hai aur wo IndiaMART me First of all mam ek cheez mai bata du IndiaMART is a matchmaking portal yaha pe ek cheez mai aapko thoda sa bata du issue jo bhi rahega first of all buyer ki suni chahiye kyuki buyer jo hai wo repeated aayega hai na matlab buyer ko bar bar aana hai aapki team sir humko buyer ki complaint hai na.
Executive: Hello sir mai dekhiye mujhe isme itna yahi karna hai.
Customer: Let me finish sir please.
Executive: Yes sir please.
Customer: Koi bhi team koi bhi IndiaMART all over India me pura faila hua hai hamara pura pura market me hai har jagah pe lakho customer hai sir. Yes yes yes. Customer ko apne hisab se kuch bhi laga uske ticket raise karte hai.
Executive: Abhi ticket hi raised hui hai na sir aisa to hai nahi ki humne koi matlab service ki koi baat aayi hai ye wo hame resolve karne padenge. Meri baat suno meri baat suno. Yes sir yes sir. Jaise kal jaake koi ticket issue raise karega fir hum document denge tisre din koi alag ticket fir document denge ye policy samajh me nahi aa rahi sir.
Sir dekhiye hamesha nahi hai matlab abhi to ye bola gaya hai one time paste karna rehta hai. Jab bhi jab bhi koi proof hai aapke to document jab koi koi cheez kisi ko proof kyu karni hai ki jab koi cheez koi aadmi galat hai jaise mai kahi pe ja raha hu mere paas kuch saman hai police mere ko pakad rahi hai to wo bolegi sir aap genuine citizen ho iski koi guarantee kya hai to mere paas saman hai aur iske paas mere paas bill nahi hai to mere paas uske sath koi proof karne ka koi nahi hai ki jaise ye legally meri cheez hai to fir mere ko document dene padte hai ki sir dekho ye mai citizen hu mai yaha rehta hu mai ye cheeze ye cheez jab kab hui ye cheez jab pakad jab customer koi cheez base karta hai to uske kya proof mangaiye proof jo hai wo dega ab humko proof dijiye hamare khilaf ki aapke against ye proof hai. Nahi I trust you sir aap bahut purane client hai I totally trust you ki aap aap kabhi galat kaam nahi karenge itna to mujhe pata hai ki aap ek bahut valuable client hai. Galat kaam mai galat kaam man lo ek minute one minute maine galat kiya hai chalo man lo ek for one point ke liye man lete hai ki maine galat kiya hai. Yes. Maine kiya nahi hai mere paas sare proof hai. Ji mujhe pata hai sir aapka matlab kya hai uski whatsapp details pura recording pura Yes. Barabar hai maine kuch galat nahi kiya hai 100% sure hai. Mere ko office me kahi par bhi maine kuch bhi karna padega mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai usme. Nahi nahi bilkul sir aap pe mujhe trust hai aap mere client ho hai na yes. Aur ye koi koi bhi banda jaake kahi par bhi kisi form ke liye ulta seedha complaint kar de ulta seedha likh le uske against aapke paas me kya hai? Isme aisa koi bahut bada issue nahi hai ye dekhiye hota kya hai na jabhi bhi complaint aati hai abhi isme bhi ye pehli baar mere pe dekhiye isse pehle bhi complaints aayi hai client ke against but abhi IndiaMART ne ye shuru kiya hai ki ye ye documents attach karne padte hai isko side rakhte hai second of all aapko bas ek legal team connect karegi aur wo conference call karati hai buyer ke sath shayad mujhe jaha tak pata hai hai na aapko bas baat karke wo issue resolve karna rehta hai aur matlab dekhiye aisa kuch bahut bada aapne usko abhi kuch mangoge to sahi ki nahi aapne aapne maine usko dali thi mai bol tu ne IndiaMART me mere ko gali di aap man loge nahi manoge. Nahi nahi sir kabhi nahi diye. Customer ke paas me aap puchiye aap koi bhi aisa proof la dijiye ki jisne customer ke aapke sath kuch galat kiya hai wo proof hoga hum sari details sari jo bhi updates mangi pura kabhi bhi mango hum dene ke liye taiyar hai. Sir isme behavior ki ticket nahi khuli hai aap koi bhi discussion kariye buyer ke sath buyer aap se koi bhi discussion kare isme ticket ye khuli hai ki monetary dispute hai na 23000 ka right to wo usme baat karenge aur matlab legal
Customer: Dekho jaise maine tooti hui cheez di hai wo bol raha hai aap proof mangaiye mai turant koi bhi jo mangi puri pura dene ke liye taiyar hu uske against jo bhi karna padega sara mai kuch karunga. Hmm. To isme sir dekhiye matlab haan yes sir. Banda jaake bolegi tune tooti hui cheez bheji hai to mai kab usko ye phone karunga jab wo mere ko proof dega. Hmm hmm. To koi issue nahi hai sir dekhiye isme matlab kal jaake koi agar ticket kar diya tisra din tisra kar diya sir mai business ye sare problem solve karunga ya mai apna khud ka business karunga mai. To isme dekhiye first of all sir isko step by step lete hai sir isme step by step chalte hai okay isme se aap mostly sir dekhiye mostly cheeze aapki verified hai aapki hai na mobile number should be verified email already verified hai aapki GST bhi portal pe updated hi hai to most probably sir bas aapko I think cancel check ka maybe ho sakta hai wo provide karna pade wo bhi mai ek baar puch leta hu okay kyuki ye nahi hai dekho abhi abhi aap chahte jo bhi formalities honge hum pure karne ke liye sir ready hai no problem aap jo bhi mango koi bhi cheez aapko jaise koi cheez solve karne ke liye mera isme koi role nahi hai sir iske baad mai bata du. We are ready for all this but kal jaake kisi ko apne se kuch galat lag raha hai jaake kuch galat ek kaam karte hai sir mai apne hisab se aapko personally uske jo cheez ko IndiaMART ki baat nahi hai sir keval samajhne ke liye ki dekho customer ke jaise maine aapko wo Shivam Quarry ka maine bheja tha aapko usi tarah se ye pura ka pura rehta hai sir. Hum customer se is bar wo customer hai puri sari wo apne paas recording hai sir mai ek baar ek lijiye ek baar check kar lijiye. Nahi nahi sir bilkul aap mai aap se aap se to mai ittefaq rakhta hu aap matlab aap kaise client mujhe pata hai sir aap purane client hai. Customer ke sath bar bar dekho ye hum bhi misbehave kare ye ek baar ke liye hum kuch bhi kar lenge sir lekin ye cheez aisi hui sir one time koi bhi rule ho one time nahi hota. Nahi ab dekhiye this is what yes sir isme dekhiye koi bahut bada issue nahi hai aapke number pe call jayega bas IndiaMART ka okay aap please matlab jo rahega sir aap please unse coordinate main aapki taraf se bas ye aana chahiye ki aap non contactable na rahe hai na aap please unse coordinate kar lijiyega wo issue resolve kar dete jo legal team hoti hai wo aapki bhi sunegi buyer ki bhi sunegi aur matlab sir jo bhi issue rehta hai wo turant resolve ho jata hai koi dikkat nahi hoti hai. Aisa hota rehta hai. Sir hua section me kal jaake wo complaint kisi aur ne complaint kar di mere against. Buyer ke paas authority hai na sir wo complaint karega matlab hogi tisre din koi alag kuch kar dega fir IndiaMART hai ki nahi hai fir ko har bar usko court me jana padega. Nahi nahi sir. Har bar safai nahi deni padegi but agar yaha pe recorded complaint aati hai aur agar wo issue aisa lagta hai sir ki isme legal team ki involvement hai tab wo khud ba khud legal team involve hoti hai okay aapke pehle bhi complaints aaye hai. Sir hoga ki nahi hoga mai sara proof dunga agar customer galat hua to aapka action kya rahega? Sir agar customer galat hota hai to fir hum matlab issue matlab yaha pe close kar dete hai buyer ko samjha dete hai sir ki buyer matlab samjha denge sir jab kisi ache aadmi ke khilaf kuch galat bolna gunaah hota hai. To wo gunaah ki saja hogi ki nahi hogi fir IndiaMART me. Sir IndiaMART koi judicial authority to nahi hai na sir ki hum buyer ke against koi complaint lenge. Koi bhi koi bhi customer uske platform pe aake kisi ne complaint kar dega chalega aapko. Agar wo galat proof hote hai tab na sir aisa to hai nahi ki hamesha proof hoga to action kya hoga mai to wo chahiye. Agar seller galat proof hota hai yes agar aur in writing chahiye ki agar customer galat hua to aap kya action loge? Sir action buyer ke against to complaint nahi resolve hoti buyer ko samjhaya hi jata hai sir ki matlab ye issue resolve nahi ho sakta buyer ke against hum kya complaint complaint le sakte hai. Wo agar uske kal jaake kisi aur se uske channel se usko galat complaint kar dega. Agar kuch fraud behavior karta hai sir IndiaMART pe to wo block bhi ho jata hai matlab IndiaMART does block that matlab fraud buyers jo IndiaMART pe hote hai aap aapko bhi koi fraud buyer aata hai call karta hai to aap usko hash one daba ke block kar sakte hai aapko wo nahi aayega agar koi fraud buyer aata hai to recorded line pe aap chalti call pe hash one daba ke us buyer ko block bhi kar sakte hai IndiaMART ki ye policy hai supplier ke liye ki aapko galat buyers agar contact karte hai fraud buyers to aap chalti call pe hash one daba ke uske dimag aisa hai wo short tempered hai. Sir usme to sir ye to ek business ka hissa hai na sir. Lag raha hai jaake mai 100% sahi hu. Sir wo to business ka hissa hai na sir business short tempered usko galat laga to iske hisab se wo ticket raise karega fir usko sir dekhiye mai aapko mai aapko as an account manager bas itna bata raha hu ki aapko ek team connect karegi thik hai aap unse coordinate kar lijiyega kyuki sir mere pe energy waste karke kya fayda aapka hai na mai isme koi involvement rakhta nahi hu mera jo kaam tha wo maine aapko bata diya screenshot bhi share kar diya right to jo aapko team connect karegi legal team aap unko ye cheez batayenge to jyada better rahega sir hai na kyuki matlab wo aap se jyada coordinate kar payenge issue ko jyada better samajh payenge. Koi baat nahi aap apni procedure bataiye baki humko kya karna hai hum kar denge thik hai. Thik hai sir okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to explain their side of issue.

- Customer states they already shared documents.

- Customer says IndiaMART has not resolved past complaints.

- Customer wants to know action against fraudulent buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained legal team will connect.

- Executive shared a screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Executive explained IndiaMART is a matchmaking portal.

- Executive said customer will receive a call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to coordinate with legal team.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaints, legal team, documents, fraud, buyers
